tool_description: API for accessing professional tennis data
name: tennisprodata
title: tennisprodata

api_list.name: Get Live Scores
api_list.description: API to get live scores for an active tournament.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tennisprodata1.p.rapidapi.com/live-results/paris/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tennisprodata1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tennisprodata1.p.rapidapi.com/live-results/{tournament}/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tennisprodata1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Tournament Results
api_list.description: API for getting tournament results for a given tournament.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tennisprodata1.p.rapidapi.com/tournament-results/2022/paris/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tennisprodata1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tennisprodata1.p.rapidapi.com/tournament-results/{year}/{tournament}/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tennisprodata1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Annual Tournaments
api_list.description: API for finding all tournaments in a given year.

api_list.name: Get Player Info
api_list.description: Endpoint for retrieving data for specific players.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tennisprodata1.p.rapidapi.com/players/Tommy Paul/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tennisprodata1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tennisprodata1.p.rapidapi.com/players/{player_name}/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
